§ 31309. General civil penalty Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, a person violating this chapter or a regulation prescribed under this chapter is liable to the United States Government for a civil penalty of not more than $10,000. (Pub. L. 100–710, title I, § 102(c), Nov. 23, 1988, 102 Stat. 4741.)
